verbs.description: as [ARG1: sea ice] [V: melts] some say walruses need better protection given a choice between giving birth on land or sea ice pacific walrus mothers most often choose ice likewise they prefer sea ice for molting mating nursing and resting between dives for food trouble is as the century progresses there going to be far less ice around director shaye wolf chukchi sea trump u s arctic alaska center for biological diversity u s fish and wildlife service justice department beaufort sea barack obama president president donald trump chad jay russia texas
